author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-2521 Support separation between "no method to be called" and "method execution failure" situations to handle according specification:
- activate method failure is logged and must cause activation failure
- deactivate method failure is just logged
- modified method failure is just logged
- bind method failure is just logged
- unbind method failure is just logged

author: jbellis
msg: add TimeUnit.convert call to AsyncResult.  patch by Martin Hentschel; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-1362

author: rhuijben
msg: Add a simple sandbox helper to create a stable temporary filename and
use this to fix the new export test on Windows. (This failed because
the handle returned from mkstemp was kept open during cleanup).

author: jstrachan
msg: added the correct temporary snapshot repo for CAMEL-3028

author: olamy
msg: add README regarding releasing scm stuff
